testsuite.name: As a bloomingdales.com customer, I verify the global Loyallist offer information on the PDP page.

testcase.classname: As a bloomingdales.com customer, I verify the global Loyallist offer information on the PDP page.
testcase.name: Verify coremetrics tag for loyallist global offer main callout on pdp (outline example : | guest user | Loyalty_Offer_Fixed | member_product |)

testcase.classname: As a bloomingdales.com customer, I verify the global Loyallist offer information on the PDP page.
testcase.name: Verify coremetrics tag for loyallist global offer main callout on pdp (outline example : | registered user | Loyalty_Offer_Multiplier | member_product |)

testcase.classname: As a bloomingdales.com customer, I verify the global Loyallist offer information on the PDP page.
testcase.name: Verify coremetrics tag for loyallist global offer main callout on pdp (outline example : | loyallist | Loyalty_Offer_Fixed | master_product |)
